snippet: The government is offering a debt write-off to Croats who have blocked bank accounts, owe less than the equivalent of about $5,000 and currently receive some sort of welfare benefits.

byline.original: By JOSEPH OROVIC and ALISON SMALE
byline.contributor: Joseph Orovic reported from Zadar, and Alison Smale from Budapest.

lead_paragraph: The government is offering a debt write-off to Croats who have blocked bank accounts, owe less than the equivalent of about $5,000 and currently receive some sort of welfare benefits.

headline.main: Croatia Forgiving Debt of Some of Its Poorest Citizens
